projectName: Task.filewas v0.1.0 - Otonom AI Proje Gelistirme Platformu
description: Craft Agents UI tasarimi + Everything Claude Code entegrasyonu ile otonom proje gelistirme platformu

milestones.name: CLI & Agent
milestones.description: CLI subprocess, agent spawn, prompt builder

milestones.name: Gelismis UI
milestones.description: Diff viewer, File browser, Drag&drop, Background tasks

milestones.name: Ek Sayfalar
milestones.description: Sources, Agents, Skills, Logs, Changelog, Roadmap UI

milestones.name: Test & QA
milestones.description: Unit test, E2E test, security review

phases.name: Root Monorepo Kurulumu
phases.description: npm workspaces ile root package.json olustur

tasks.title: Root scripts
tasks.description: dev, build, lint, format, test scripts tanimla

tasks.title: Runtime dependencies
tasks.description: express, socket.io, jsonwebtoken, bcryptjs, zod, cors, uuid

tasks.title: Root tsconfig.json
tasks.description: Base config - strict: true, target: ES2022, moduleResolution: bundler

tasks.title: Shared tsconfig.json
tasks.description: extends root, declaration: true, composite: true, outDir: dist

phases.name: Backend & Frontend TypeScript Config
phases.description: Backend ve frontend icin TypeScript ayarlari

tasks.title: Backend tsconfig.json
tasks.description: extends root, module: NodeNext, outDir: dist, rootDir: src

tasks.title: Frontend tsconfig.json
tasks.description: extends root, jsx: react-jsx, include vite types

phases.name: ESLint, Prettier & Git
phases.description: Kod kalitesi araclari ve git ayarlari

tasks.title: .prettierrc
tasks.description: singleQuote: true, semi: false, tabWidth: 2, printWidth: 100

phases.name: Shared Types - Agent & API
phases.description: Agent ve API response type tanimlari

tasks.title: shared/src/types/agent.ts
tasks.description: Agent, AgentConfig, AgentStatus, ToolCall, ToolResult interfaces

tasks.title: shared/src/types/websocket.ts
tasks.description: WebSocket event types - SessionEvent, MessageEvent, AgentEvent, ToolEvent

tasks.title: Shared build test
tasks.description: npm run build -w shared && import test

tasks.title: backend/src/index.ts
tasks.description: Express app olustur, listen on PORT

tasks.title: backend/src/config/env.ts
tasks.description: dotenv ile PORT, JWT_SECRET, DATA_PATH oku

tasks.title: backend/src/middleware/cors.ts
tasks.description: CORS - origin: frontend URL, credentials: true

tasks.title: backend/src/middleware/logger.ts
tasks.description: Request logger - method, path, status, duration

tasks.title: backend/src/storage/init.ts
tasks.description: data/ klasoru yoksa olustur, default dosyalari yaz

phases.name: Storage Schema & Utils
phases.description: Storage dosya formatlari ve yardimci fonksiyonlar

tasks.title: data/settings.json
tasks.description: Platform ayarlari: defaultModel, fallback, permission defaults

tasks.title: frontend/vite.config.ts
tasks.description: React plugin, resolve aliases, server port 3000

phases.name: Theme & CSS Variables
phases.description: Craft Agents dark theme ve OKLCH renkleri

tasks.title: Foreground varyasyonlari
tasks.description: color-mix ile foreground-5, foreground-10, foreground-30 etc.

tasks.title: Base typography
tasks.description: body: text-[15px], code: text-[13px], small: text-[11px]

tasks.title: frontend/src/components/ui/button.tsx
tasks.description: Button variants: default, ghost, outline, destructive. Sizes: sm, md, lg

tasks.description: Dialog, DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle wrapper

tasks.title: frontend/src/lib/animations.ts
tasks.description: Framer variants: fadeIn, slideIn, stagger, collapse

tasks.description: Route path sabitleri: ROUTES.HOME, ROUTES.PROJECTS, etc.

tasks.description: Sol sidebar placeholder - width from store
